Reviews.Title: Works well, signal looks good
Reviews.Author: Tom S. "Tom S."
Reviews.Content: A cable that works well. The signal holds up well even though it is a long cable. Aesthetically about as pleasing as a cable can get. I bought it at a very reasonable price as well.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive cable / Works Well
Reviews.Author: Dominic A. Pizza
Reviews.Content: Cable is inexpensive and quality is good.  I have 4 of these cables 1x 100' and 3x 50' all of them work well.  Cable set includes BNC to RCA adaptors so you can use this with pretty much any device.  A 3/4" hole is perfect for getting the connectors and a cable fish pole through walls.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Ronald Fowler
Reviews.Content: Best Price anywhere.  Needed extra for camera install, did the job and just as good quality as the cable that cam with kit.

Reviews.Title: zmodo cable
Reviews.Author: wrodriguez
Reviews.Content: I like is very good product and I recomendent white cable is nice to put in secret no one see thank you

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: HMH "hmichael0330"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this cable a week ago and received it exactly one week later in good condition, well packaged, and it works as advertised.  I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who's looking for a good quality and inexpensive cctv cable for home.

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: Josh Leger
Reviews.Content: A cable is a cable. It's going to work 99.99% of the time no matter where you buy it. But Amazon always has the best prices! This cable is great, because it also comes with an adapter to convert from BNC ro RCA, which is great for chainging displays and recording devices. The wires length also doesn't compromise the datarate.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: John F. Keith
Reviews.Content: This cable is good quality , light weight and very easy to hook up.  Cable allows power, video and audio feeds..

Reviews.Title: Great value wire
Reviews.Author: J. Mccormick
Reviews.Content: I bought this cable to hook up to my Swan Security System. I don't know why Swan packs black cable instead of white. I don't know anyone that has black wall or ceilings! Most retailers charge at least twice as much for white cable so I went to good ol' Amazon to get what I want at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: thanks
Reviews.Author: Dragon M.
Reviews.Content: I like this cable from u, any other when I order  working good..... camera too....in future I will be order camera too... Thanks

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: kendall
Reviews.Content: Great product, does the job just fine.  Not much more to say.  I have it hooked into a Secu 420TVL camera and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Franz Phillips
Reviews.Content: used this cable to extended a shorter cable. works great. no problems at all. going to buy more when I set the rest of my cameras up

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Charles M. Moughamian
Reviews.Content: I brought this and ended up having to replace them due to the video loss and they are cheap. You might be better off shopping around for a better cable.

Reviews.Title: Good stuff
Reviews.Author: James TC-AZ
Reviews.Content: I bought this because my other wire was misplaced in a remodel. This was a good price and when I received it it was good quality. It was long enough for any location and it has a good picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described.
Reviews.Author: rbtvance
Reviews.Content: Exactly as described. This item was was well packaged, shipped and received promptly, and was exactly as described. This is a good product and was good customer service.

Reviews.Title: Not the best
Reviews.Author: NostraDumbass
Reviews.Content: Ordered these to extend the cables that came with my cameras.  They are not as good of a quality as the ones I got.  They do the job but I get more noise with these cables.  Can't beat the price, though.

Reviews.Title: Not for Foscams
Reviews.Author: Tom White "Triplet Dad"
Reviews.Content: I ordered these to use the power side for my Foscam wireless cameras. Wrong size. It's too big for the power. Looks like a nice enough product, though.

ProductInfo.Features:
50 feet video/power cable in white
All-in-one video and power cable
BNC connectors and includes 2 BNC/RCA adapters
Plug and Play ready; For camera with DC power only
Output type BNC video connector & 2.1mm power connectors
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 50ft Feet Video Power Wire Security Camera Cable with BNC RCA Connectors for CCTV DVR Surveillance System WD1
